@NonNullApi @NonNullFields

程序包 org.springframework.cache

Spring's generic cache abstraction.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Cache
    Interface that defines common cache operations.
    Cache.ValueWrapper
    A (wrapper) object representing a cache value.
    CacheManager
    Spring's central cache manager SPI.
  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    Cache.ValueRetrievalException
    Wrapper exception to be thrown from Cache.get(Object, Callable) in case of the value loader callback failing with an exception.

程序包org.springframework.cache的说明

Spring's generic cache abstraction. Concrete implementations are provided in the subpackages.
